body_html:
@windweller yes, it will perform gradient clipping, see the code implementation in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/utils/clip_grad.py
We use the github issues for bugs and feature requests, for questions it's better to ask them on https://discuss.pytorch.org/

body:
@windweller yes, it will perform gradient clipping, see the code implementation in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/utils/clip_grad.py
We use the github issues for bugs and feature requests, for questions it's better to ask them on https://discuss.pytorch.org/
